statements: SELECT author, device_id, version, update_description, update_date FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT version, device_id, update_description, author, update_date FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, update_date, update_description, version, author FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT author, device_id FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, device_id FROM firmware_updates WHERE version = 'v1.0' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND author LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY version ASC, update_date ASC;
SELECT author, version, update_description FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT DISTINCT version FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_description LIKE '%bug%' OR update_description LIKE '%issue%';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY author DESC, version ASC, update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM wireless_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM wireless_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT update_id, device_id, update_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wireless_devices WHERE device_name IN ('Device1', 'Device2', 'Device3');
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_version = '1.0'
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM wireless_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = '98ab6a61-788c-4b9a-a705-7ec48a9c0406'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM firmware_updates
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM wireless_devices WHERE firmware_version IN ('1.1', '1.2')
SELECT firmware_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer, last_updated FROM wireless_devices;
SELECT device_id, log_message, log_date FROM device_logs;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE firmware_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM wireless_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT firmware_id, device_id, version_number, release_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE firmware_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer, last_updated FROM wireless_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_message, log_date FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE version_number LIKE '%v1.0%' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, update_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT firmware_version, last_update_date FROM devices ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT device_id, update_date FROM firmware_history WHERE success = true AND device_id = 2 ORDER BY update_date ASC;

SELECT firmware_updates.update_id, firmware_updates.update_version, firmware_history.success FROM firmware_updates JOIN firmware_history ON firmware_updates.update_id = firmware_history.update_id WHERE firmware_history.success = true
SELECT device_name, device_type, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE last_update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY firmware_version DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices JOIN manufacturers ON devices.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY total_devices DESC
SELECT device_name, MAX(last_update_date) AS latest_update FROM devices GROUP BY device_name

SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM manufacturers JOIN firmware_updates ON firmware_updates.device_id = manufacturers.manufacturer_id GROUP BY manufacturer_name, headquarters_location
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT version, device_id FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE version LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, version FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE version LIKE 'v2%';
SELECT device_id, MAX(update_date) AS latest_update FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT AVG(device_id) AS average_device_id FROM firmware_updates;
